Line3.F34FB: My poor boy. I...you're all I have left...
VoiceDir1.F34FB: Absolute heartbreak. Your only son was killed while lost in the swamps.
VoiceDir11.F34FB: The player has just returned your missing son's dagger, proving that he is in fact dead. Disbelief, a horrible realization.
VoiceDir3.F34FB: Absolute heartbreak. Your only son was killed while lost in the swamps.
